snippet.title: Magenta Horizon - Early Access Release Date Revealed –
snippet.description:
Magenta Horizon is a fast-paced 2D action platformer game that is heavily inspired by the Spectacle Fighter genre. Playing as a Reaper of the twisted purgatorial afterlife, push your skills to the limit to destroy the hordes of demons and epic bosses to reach your destination.

Act 1 is currently free as a demo, and Act 2 will be released as Early Access. 
Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2109060/Magenta_Horizon/

[Credit]
Video Edit: Jenn Endres (twitter link: https://twitter.com/Jenn_Endres)
